SYSTEM: 01.02.L%C3%B3gicaDescriptiva.pdf: Página 16
16 
Representación de Conocimientos: Lógica Formal y Lógica Descriptiva 
OWL 
Web Ontology Language 
 
Built on top of RDF(S) and renaming DAML+OIL primitives 
 
3 layers: 
-  OWL Lite 
-  A small subset of primitives 
-  Easier for frame-based tools to transition to 
-  OWL DL 
-  Description logic 
-  Decidable reasoning 
-  OWL Full 
-  RDF extension, allows metaclasses 
 
Several syntaxes: 
-  Abstract syntax 
-  Manchester syntax 
-  RDF/XML 
Representación de Conocimientos: Lógica Formal y Lógica Descriptiva 
Class taxonomy of the OWL KR ontology
speaker: SYSTEM
